page.title: 13CHILDREN'S EVENING LEISURE
page.content: This is how our 7-11 year olds spent their time after school, this Spring. { Most girls and boys spent more time watching T.V.{,than anything else. {Some watched T.V. for 3 to 4 hrs - {some none at all!}But on average, each child watched 1 hour each night. { Most if not all children, enjoyed {simply}playing with a friend. { }Football and bike-riding{were very {popular with}boys{especially with the {younger ones.}Older boys,- and girls, {spent much more time than younger {children playing with}computer games. Gymnastics,{as well as}ballet{and}tap, {were more popular with}girls,{who { also spent more time with}pets.{ Youth Club,swimming,tennis,snooker, {and}pool,{were also popular with both {boys and girls,as were}reading, music, hobbies, shopping,{and even}gardening!
